content.detailedDescription:
I take the firths photo of a sphere in the sky in 6/11/2007, at 16,41h.
the sky was perfectly clear.
the others were in 25/11/2007 at the same hour, on the beach of le���a da palmeira, oporto. i send the photos that i take with my telefhone.
content.summary: Some kind of sphere in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my parents backyard just hanging out and i remember just staring up in the night sky.  the time was between 7-8pm.  i was looking up and at the left corner of my eye i noticed an object that was red in color.  at first i thought it was just another satelite.  the object was far away like above the atmosphere so i can't tell you the shape.  it was moving like the same speed as a satelite would circulating the earth.  the direction it was going was east.  i stared at it and did not take my eyes of it.  then the most weirdest thing was that it stopped.  it completely stopped, it just stayed frozen, then what seemed like the speed of light, it u-turned back to the other direction (west) so fast that it left a red streak of light.  

i will never forget that experience.  i still talk about my experience till this day.  this is unexplainable.  it can not be an astroid, a satelite or even one of our own.  no rock stops and goes.  no aircraft today can do what i described.  no human being can survive the speed it traveled when it took off especially when it turned around and took off.

we are not alone.
content.summary: Red colored object

content.detailedDescription:
#1 sitting on our porch (my wife & i) we observed very bright, unblinking lights move to the south, turn abruptly and move east, and continue for aprox 30 minutes moving in a calculated path, changing directions as if observing something.  our house was directly in the path of the secret air base in southern pa. and every few days were punctuated with low flight of a-10 warthogs and a few other unidentified aircraft which would make thunderous noises and be extremely low to the ground.

#2 on a mid summer evening my son (19 at the time) saw a bank of five, unblinking lites approaching from the north. we watched for aprox 4 or 5 minutes when we realized there was no sound and there was a very slow, steady approachment. i ran upstairs, grabbed a camcorder and rushed downstairs to tape the 'sighting'. unfortuneatly, i left the lenscap on the cam,corder and all that was taped was our voices. (since than, eradicated). the lites seemed to either hoover over, or stop short of our barn, and both of us were tremondusly excited. the lights moved backwards and suddenly moved abruptly upwards and dissapeared.
content.summary: #1 lite chged directions several times #2 80+ ft over barn(30 ft) visible

content.detailedDescription:
At 6:00 am i woke up and went to my kitchen that has a window facing looking east.  i just happened to look out the window into my back yeard and notice the stange bright light in the sky.  it was not a headlight on an airplane as most of the airplanes that fly over my house are usually very high up and noticeable.  it was something similar to those of the phx lights from 97-98, however, only one light.  it was a very bright reddish yellow almost fireball looking.  i must also mention that it was somewhat cloudy this morning...Cloudy enough to not see stars.  at first i thought of the satellite thats due to hit earth this month.  moreover, it was steady with a bit of a flicker and then disappeared.  a few seconds later it was just as bright again in an area a few away and then moved back to its original spot and then just vanished.  i would say that the distance it was away from me was anywhere where from 1 to 5 miles...But it could of been further and at a higher altitude due to the position i was in.  i was looking out my window over the roof of an adjacent property with clear view of the sky.  that's what i saw and i'm sticking to it. 

sorry i have no pictures or videos or anything of the sort.  

thanks, 
~experiencing strange stuff.
content.summary: Reddish yellow fireball like object hoovering in eastern sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was 8:19 when me and my dad saw the ship and we were fritend and we tried to call an ufo expert but nobudy was there and so we bouth were frightend and they made reproduction test and they tested them on us.






here is something to inclose me. jessistheshizz.Yahoo.Com
content.shape: Diamond,  Disc,  Flash,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Teardrop,  Triangle,  Other
content.summary: It was a bright ship with these alieans looking out of it.

content.detailedDescription:
Some years back' while fishing with my grandpa on the comberland river. we had just arrived to the fishing area we had always gone to. my grandpa pumped up the lantern lit it and hung it on a tree nub.Grandpa set up one fishing pole and casted it out. while attempting to set up the second pole the lantern went out. i was setting on a make shift saw horse as a stoolto watch to the pole while gramps was telling me a story.Suddenly the lantern went out and i was looking out to the bigger opening of the lake watching the water glistiining for an unknown reason or just because of the clear star filled sky i just ask my grandpa if he had ever seen a ufo. he told me he didnt like to talk about them because every time he did something seemd to happen. soon as he said that the lentern went out and allthe lake frogs and bugs crickets went silent.
i then looked over at gramps trying to pump the lantern and relight it with a brown paper bag strip. but it would not relight up. grandpa said! ummm thats funny i just pumped this lantern up and it should burn for about two hours. then just about 22deg.To my right... and 45deg.From thr ground upward was 2 craft flying diagnalto each other.The front craft had a very bright buleish light at the left front corner. the light was shinning completley to the side and not in the direction the craft was traveling. all the sounds of the lake frogs and bugs went dead silent.I picked up the big flash light to shine it on the craft.

but gramps told me not to shine the light. he said we didnt know what it was and it could have been from the military. we where spooked pretty bad. just about the time to two craft went over our heads just above yree top level .. i looked in the direction where the crafts came from and another set of them went over just as the first two had done.We quickly reeled the poles in and grabed the fishing gear. and went on a fast pace home. me and my granddad never talked abut the sighting again as though it never happened. it was like we we was not supposed to remark. i never understood why.

then" my grandmother who is still alive told me that me and grandad where down there under them lights for four hours. but i cant seem to fill in that time frame. because when we got there and granpa lit the lantern the shortly it went out. .. he said thats funny i just pumped that thing up and it should burn for two hours. and i know i was in a room whith my grandpa neather one of us had clothes. both naked. setting on a metal bench but not cold.The room was lit up but no lights. the walls where lights. grandpa looked like he was frozen in a stair dazed looking straight ahead knees togather elbows to his sides and hands in his lap. the tall living  thing was standiing to my right behind what looked like a medical table but the table was extra wide and not so long from head to toe. i was going to lay my head underneath the things coming down above the bed. but the lizerdy looking thing told me to lay the other way. once it touched me .. i was so shocked i went out. like passed out. i woke up. set up .. then stood on my feet.  i then was lead to a dark hall that bent to the right as i walked i came to a box of wiggley blue watery looking light on the floor... the creature thing just looked at it.. like i had the feeling we could just stand and look at it forever or i could step into it. so i did step into the box of blue watery light and .... bingo! every bit of that was over. just wanted to mention.. they dont speak. they comunicate through there face. and you seem to have to know whats being said. as they stare at you. i told it to do what it was needing to do and put us back. i think i have always known what they want from us. im now 45 years old. and that was not the only time this stuff has happend. i have seen the boomerang that you can see thrugh. and what looked like a chevron vee shap and a white candy corn shape craft. and some blinking transporting from one spot to another n the blink of an eye. i have removed a small object from my body dome shaped with a small coil spring like antana looking black indistructibal hair like wire. i have seen the small short cratures in my home just a few years ago... i would be williing to be hipnotized and or what ever means of info providing i could give you.. but you must know i am telling the truth. i am in sound mind.. as crazy as this may sound. you would know by profesionaly testing me. that im telling the truth. give me the chance. to prove this and i'll tell you what they want. 

i know alot of folks laugh at people who has incountered this stuff and thats why i have not come forward before. but" if you want to know more.. just ask... and if not! then good enough.    the four craft where rectangle reflecting heavy bulky black hot pinkish inside lighting. on an upper area or level. the craft looked flat as to the length an width.No sharp corners. rounded.
content.summary: Dark' in color' no sound' slow speed hot pink in slats,like altura violet light. high blue light beem. 4 crafts diagnal to each other in sets of 2. distance from me. about seventy five feet, missing time. burnt skin. red powder. reptile looking things

content.detailedDescription:
I was going outside to take my dog to pee. and i saw this object that at the time appeared to be a black circle a little ways behind the house. it looked at eye level to be about a quarter the size of the moon and was moving with no noise and moved at a slow unwavering pace. at that moment i became frightened so i went inside. then i went and got my camera to get a picture so my parents wouldnt think i was being paranoid or anything like that, but i was to nervous at that point to return outside. so i went to my bedroom and looked out my window and the object was a little ways behind and above the tree level in our front yard. so i took the camera and took 4 pictures. only one of the pictures was even remotely good enough to show to anyone because the object was so far away at this point. but when the object was over the trees while i was viewing it out my window it was not moving and i continued to watch it untill it did. and when it started moving it was gone pretty fast. i'm really not sure why or how i first noticed the object.And as far as emotional or physical reaction to the objects presence, i felt extremely hot and my skin was kinda warm and i felt shakey..... but i am assuming that was adreneline from the initial shock of seeing the object. the bottom of the object appeared smoth and black but not shiny. and in the picture you can see a hump on the top like most typical saucers, but when i saw the object it only appeared like a black hole in the sky. 
the camera i used was a powershot a530 canon model if that helps with anything.
content.summary: Ufo flew slowly in straight line over my house, then stopped briefly above tree line, then continued in original direction.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving from fresno to oakhurst. fresno sits in the san juaquin valley and oakhurst sits up in the mountains west of fresno, about 45 miles away. oakhurst sits at an elevation of about 4,000 feet. anyways we were going to a super bowl party at a friends cabin. at the time we left fresno it was overcast and lightly raining, once we got into oakhurst it was partly cloudy. at about 2:30 p.M. we saw a cluster of 3 gold spheres about 300 yards from the hightes ground level. they were stationary but seemed to vibrate violently. like the way things look in a rear view mirror when you have the bass all the way up in your car. i pulled the car off the road onto a sight seeing turn out. my wife was listing to her ipod when i first saw the objects but was soon as frightened as me. we got out of the car and the objects were still vibrating. i dont know if they were vibrating but its the only word i can think of to describe the event. my wife was silent as i began to fumble through my pockets for my cell phone to take a picture. as soon as i pulled my phone out the objects vibration seemed to intensify and then all the sudden vanished. they didnt move out of sight, they just vanished like a romulen "bird of prey". we booth stood there for a few minutes longer in hopes of the objects re-appearing but they did not. we both got in the car my wife speechless and i blabbering on about what we just had seen. once we got to my friends cabin i told them what we had seen. my wife seemed cautious to validate what i told them. needless to say i do not drink and my wife drinks very little, we both have perfect vision. i will not speculate on what i saw as being a ufo but it was like nothing i had ever seen in real life or a movie.

again there was 3 gold shpere shaped objects, each one were equal in size. my wife and i agreed that they had the circumference of a large silo. diameter of about 30 feet. i couldent tell how thick they were. anyways i was in awe at the time but now im kinda spooked as is my wife.
content.summary: 3 gold sphere shaped objects about 300 yards off the ground in oakhurst ca

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on interstate hwy. 25.  it was dark and the sky was completely overcast. approx. half-way between las vegas and santa fe, nm, i suddenly observed a stationary, dome shaped object to my left (south of the highway, and an estimated 700 to 800 yards away), in an area of low cliffs and mesas.  the object stood out, dimly lit, despite the dark night, and a wedge-shaped opening - brighter than the rest of the object -was opening slowly on the front of the dome-shaped object.  it looked very much like an observatory dome which was in the process of opening to allow use of the telescope.  i had driven this route numerous times before, and had never noticed an observatory here before, so was surprised.  by the time this all registered in my mind i was at least a quarter of a mile down the highway, and the object had disappeared from view.  i pulled over to the side of the highway to try to back up and get another look, but traffic coming from behind me, and safety concerns, prevented this.  i was in a hurry to get to santa fe, so drove on.  after checking in to a hotel in santa fe i got out a new mexico map to see if it showed an observatory in the area.  the map showed no observatory anywhere in that area, and also showed no roads in to that area.  i did not pursue it farther at the time, but a couple of weeks later, when i was driving through the area again - this time in daylight - i watched the area where i had seen the object closely as i drove east on interstate hwy 25.  i saw no sign of any buildings located in the appropriate location or area, but did notice that, in what seemed to be the location of my sighting, there was a high-tension power line running from the highway, south through a deep draw and over the mesa beyond.  although i can not swear beyond any doubt that what i saw was not something "normal" and explainable, i was left with the impression that i had observed a "ufo", and that the proximity of the power line may have some significance.
content.summary: Observed dome-shaped object, on or close to ground, with wedge-shaped, lighted opening.

content.detailedDescription: "wake-up" where the words whispering in my ears,waking me up from sleep at 5:30 am that bitter cold december morning.I was at another persons' home,so i went to the rear sliding-glass door to "crack" it open and smoke a cigarette.I immediately noticed white lights fading "out" and getting "brighter".Unusual lights...So i grabbed a 8mm "digital" video camera and filmed exactly of these "orbs" of lights w/ "bell-shaped" unidentified crafts w/in them.After a half an hour i became bored w/ these crafts and went back to sleep.Four months later i reviewed said film and the images startled the s---t out of me (seeing ufos w/in orbs of a single ball of rainbow coloured "light",sillouhetted as "bell-shaped",angling,dashing;playing:"chicken" w/ each other!).I could also hear interferance. i filmed .5 hr. against the full moon,and street lights...Skeptics,you can all kiss my arse!I have the (video) proof and (possibly) an implant in the back of my head...The implant was/is from a previous encounter 3 years earlier...Of which i have no comment,because they thought they had sedated me,but...(no comments about this event ever).This video is for sale for $3,000 per 1 minute...And it's all or nothing...Or,i will eventually show it on public access-myself.This video is copyrighted and "vaulted".I lost sight of these objects because i turned off the camera and went back to bed.These objects are zipping directly at tha camera and away from it.It was 4 months later when i noticed i had ufos on the footage,and not new government "crafts"!
content.shape: Boomerang,  Cone,  Circle,  Fireball,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like
content.summary: Alien "zupruder" (home video) of new millennium (?)...

content.detailedDescription:
First, i want to state that this is the most current of three sightings i've seen.  i will report on the current one first because i have times and dates that might be confirmed by someone else.  the other two were a long time ago, but are indented in my mind because i've pondered each incident many many times.  the most current incident took place while flying from seattle to palm springs on alaska air, flight 478l.  the flight left seattle at approx. 3:15pm on oct. 4th 2007.  i was sitting in row 16 at a window seat on the left side of the plane.  we were over a mountain range or higher plateau area, approx. 5:00pm.  down the side of the mountain range and into the desert valley, i was looking down at what i first thought were three large oil or water storage tanks.  i remember saying to myself, wow, those are really large tanks, and, i wonder why they're sitting out in the desert all by themselves.  they were silvery/gray in color, and appeared to be round in shape.  as i continued to stare down on the three objects, they began to move very slowly.  this startled me, and i began to wonder if they were land vehicles, but at the same time, what land vehicle is round, and second, there was no evidence of any roads.  i also questioned myself as to, would i be able to see a land vehicle at the altitude we were at.  two of the objects moved in one direction maintaining the same distance apart as they were when stationary.  the third object moved away from the other two in the opposite direction, again very slowly.  all three objects suddenly stopped moving and remained stationary.  the third object, which had moved in the opposite direction, suddenly moved back towards the other two and went between and past the other two, which remained stationary.  the single object then stopped slightly past the other two.  all three objects were now statinary again.  now i was freaked out to say the least.  unfortunatly the wing of the aircraft now blocked my view and i was unable to observe the objects from then on.

the next two sightings i would like to describe took place at separate times.  i don't have dates or even the exact year because i didn't write it down at the time unfortunately.  i think it was 1985-88.  some buddies and myself had made arrangements with a flight company in seattle called bob & pat's fun flights.  they had some kind of connection to a reno gambling casino where they would fly you there and back, a one day trip for free.  the hook was, you had to bring a minimum of $300 in cash, and you had to say and gamble in their establishment only.  if i remember correctly this casino was not in main downtown reno.  it was fairly close to the airport because they bused us in to the casino fairly quickly.  we were scheduled to leave reno around 6-7pm.  a sudden storm had come in and it started snowing around 3-4pm.  this delayed our flight and we didn't leave until around midnight.  in those days i was known as what was called a "white knuckle" flyer.  grab the arms of the seat and hang on tight.  at any rate, i couldn't close my eyes or sleep.  since this was a chartered flight, and free no less, it had no ammenities.  i'm not sure, but i think they had maybe two attendants, no food or beverage service and after we took off all of the lights in the plane were turned out.  i don't remember any overhead lighting being on and most, if not all, of the passangers were asleep.  we had been in the air for some time and being the "white knuckle" flyer i was, i stared out the window into the darkness trying to pick out any light i could find on the ground.  probably to assure myself we were still in the air and not about to crash.  so here i was, picking out of the darkness little pockets of light that i assumed were little tiny towns tucked away somewhere, watching the light disapear behind us as we flew on.  it seemed to be a long stretch without seeing anything when suddenly a round circle of light appeared on the ground below.  when i say suddenly i mean like turning on a light bulb.  i was staring into the darkness and bang, there's a circle of light like you would see on a performer on stage.  the light was very intense, very bright and the diameter of the circle i guessed to be several hundred feet.  being from seattle i would guess it was as big in diameter as the king dome if not bigger.  now i am trying to determine where the light is coming from.  i can't see anything below us that is projecting the light, like a helicopter.  the area that is being inluminated appears to forested.  the light source is moving very slowly because you can see tree tops moving into the light on one side and disapearing on the other.  i also see a speck of what i think was a farm house and barn.  i don't know what our altitude was at this time, but we could have descended from what would have been normal cruising altitude.  suddenly the light goes out and i am again staring into the dark.  no more than maybe 3-5 seconds the light is back on.  it remained on for the second time for about 5 seconds and with a blink......Off again.  now i,m starting to freak out.  i'm staring out into the dark, back into the aircraft to see if anyone else is awake, back into the dark..........When suddenly three very very tiny lights appear from the top of the window and drop stright down to the center of the window and stop.  i damn near loaded my pants, if you know what i mean.  i'm sure my heart stopped for a moment.  as i stared at the lights, there was no movement and i at this point assumed this object was the source of my circle of light.  i had seen, heard and read about ufo's and alien abductions and was sure at this very moment we were about to be a statistic.  report: aircraft disapears in the mountains between reno and seattle.  the three lights that i am now staring at, the two on outside, appeared to be 1/4" to 1/2" apart with the third slightly highter between the two outer lights.  the scale of measurement i'm using is in relation to the scale of the airplane window.  because i'm partially color blind, i think it's refered to as being red/green color deficient, i could'nt tell what the colors of the lights were.  i do know that the two on the outside had a stronger and equal intensity than the one in the middle.  this lead me to later think that possibly the center light was a different color.  so just as i'm now thinking we're about to be swollowed up by a gigantic ufo, the three lights appear to come together as one and then gone.  my deduction on this was that the ufo went away from us at a very high speed, thus the lights appearing to come together were actually going away.  in conclusion to this story, we landed, i went home, i didn't report the sighting or even tell any one the story for some years.  i guess it's the thought of someone looking at you like a nut case and the snickers you get from the skeptics, like you don't really believe that s--t do you?  i listened to the news and read the papers for days after hoping to see or hear of a sighting, but i didn't.  

this now leads me to the third and final sighting what occured sometime between 1976-78.  i think it was about this time period because my two children were with me at the time.  i remember they were jumping around in the back of my volkswagon bus.  i had made the back kind of large play pen so the kids wouldn't get bored on long trips we made camping or to other places.  i had taken the second seat and turned it around to face the third seat and then put in a piece of plywood covered it with a big piece of foam mattress.  my two kids, would have been 3-4 and the other 6-7 at the time.  we were in lynnwood, wa. traveling east on 196th, approching the i-5 overpass leading to our home.  it had been a very stormy day with what i perceived as very unusual cloud formations, stormy, rainy, and lightning that didn't appear to hit the ground but light up the clouds at various locations.  it was very strange to me because i have lived in the seattle area my entire life and never had seen this peticular activity before.  it was approximiatly 2-3pm in the afternoon.  as we approched the overpass i saw ahead of me, maybe a 1/2 mile, what appeared to look like a ferris wheel on the horizon.  it was a large circle with lite up spokes extending from the center, to the outside circle, which was lit up the same as the spokes.  the diameter of the circle was approximately 200-300'.  the light or lights were independent of each other, evenly spaced.  i'm not sure of the colors, because as i stated in the other sighting, i have a red/green color deficiency.  they did however appear to have different intensities.  the object turned very slowly, like a ferris wheel would, but also moved in a horzional motion, like a wheel rolling on a horzional surface, again very slowly.  because we were on the overpass, which was higher than anything around us i could see about 3/4 of the object behind the small hillside in front of us.  as we decended down the other side of the over pass, and the road also declined, the hill side in front of the object eventually blocked its view.  i was approximatly a 1/2 mile from the object and spead up to get to the top of the hill and hopefully see what i thought was to be a ufo up close.  again, unfortunately, when i got to the top of the hill the object was no where to be seen.  

this concludes my story of three sighting.  i hope they can be used and helpful in your quest for the truth.  

sincerely, steve
content.summary: 3 round or disc shaped objects in the desert

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on rte. 72 in new britain, ct.  it was roughly 5pm and the sun had yet to set.  it was probably the spring of 2000, but i don't remember the exact date and unfortunately did not document this event at the time.  from a distance as i was driving, i saw a large, dark object motionless in the sky.  within a minute i was about to merge onto rte. 84, and i could clearly view this object.  it was a large, black triangle hovering directly above the highway.  it was as long as a football field, with white flashing lights at each tip, and a glowing magenta colored circle in the middle. it did not make a sound.  it was approximately 300 feet off the ground.  some cars were pulling over to view the ufo, however i drove under it.  i was terrified beyond belief, and did not look back. my heart was literally pounding out of my chest. the ufo clearly was not trying to hide.  i thought surely it would be on the news.  there was not a single mention of the ufo on the news, on the radio, or in the newspaper.  i contemplated calling the police, but figured one of the hundreds of other people witnessing this ufo had probably beat me to it.
content.summary: Black triangle hovering over highway in central ct

content.detailedDescription:
Me and two friends where walking home tonight and sighted ufos. 
we were walking north back to our estate when we saw two strange lights in the sky. the three of us got up on a wall and where looking at them when one of them started moving left accross the sky. when it was a good bit away from the other light another one appeared next to the stationary one out of nowhere. at this point we were all freaked out and started running to a nearby park where theres a hill with a clear view of the whole city one of my friends went back home at this point. we were standing on the hill for a good while and i actually got a video of one of the lights although it was takin on my phone (very low quality video)
content.summary: A series of strange lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting with a friend at bills five lakes in new albany facing the louisville skyline about 10:30 pm when i saw a bright, almost white cylinder shaped beam of light come down from the sky and hover over the top of a tree. it hovered for less than a minute and suddenly shot straight back up the sky out of sight, very rapidly.

as soon as i looked over at my friend, she said, "yeh i saw that too" we talked about it for what seemed like only 30 minutes and both agreed it was not something we could explain. the last recollection i have of time was 10:45 but my friend said it had to be very late. i checked my cell phone to see what time it was and it was 1:30 am, so i lost track of over two hours leading me to believe that i was abducted.
content.summary: Bight green cylinder column over top of trees

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the steps,and heard a strange noise.  kind of like a chain saw but different, like the sound you hear space ships make on tv, that zing zing, but some what like a chain saw too.  just unusual.  i live on a farm, which can be quite noisy.  the cows had been balling, you know mooing.  when this noise started they got very quiet.  spooky.  
then there was a motercycly, that just came out the road way, then back and forth, several times. just short distance then back again, may be five or six times.
that is when i felt something kind of pull my attention up to the sky. as i looked up i saw 2 lights, about the size of car lights hoovering side by side in the sky. they started to move towards me, then all of a sudden they were gone, like a switch was turned off.
then again my attention was drawn, this time to the right, about 1 quarter of a mile away.  there the lights were again, then zip gone again, right back in front of me. then they rotated, one over the other.
i jumped up and ran in the house scared silly.  but i ran to the front window and looked out again to see where the lights were. they were slowly coming towards me.  i had the tv on and the sound went off.  i started to get a tingly sensation on my neck and arms, my 2 year old son was sleeping on the couch, sound asleep, this was unusual for him this time of the evening,he was normaly up running around.
i could feel a pulling sensation on my body, kind of like all the hair on my skin was standing on end.  i then ran to the back of the house to see if i could see the lights going over, but they were gone. i ran back out side the cows had started mooing again, the motor cycle was gone, the sound on the tv was back.  i was very shaken by this, of coures everyone thinks i'm nuts but i know there was something there.
that is my story.  since then i have only seen one other unsual sighting it only lasted a few seconds, so i won't call this a ufo
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Heard noise, looked up and saw strange light

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
It was around 7:20-7:30pm ish and i was standing in my driveway waiting to be picked up by family to go to a dinner outing. 

the sky had a few clouds, but was otherwise clear. i occasionally looked up, as anyone bored and waiting would do, when i spotted what i thought was a plane since the lights were so bright.

it moved pretty slow, but i realized it wasn't flying normally, it was flying in strange patterns and making extremely sudden direction changes without any sort of pause. (ie- left to right instantly) it was low enough and blocked out some of the stars enough to see it was distinctly boomerang shaped with 3 white lights. one on the tip and one on each 'wing'.

it ascended and descended rapidly and made zig-zag motions(i joked that it looked like 2 people were fighting over the controls), it finally started to move in one direction but made one last jog in the opposite direction before continuing in the original direction. it dissapeared, but it didn't just fly away, the lights just went out. like someone just turned them off.

i was very startled, when family arrived to get me only seconds later i was in a minor panic. my family is open to the idea of u.F.O.'s so i wasn't met with any criticism. i captured only one photo on my cell phone, but i don't think it's of much value, it's at an angle and you can only see the lights. it looks like airplane lights in the picture. but i've never heard of such a distinctly shaped airplane, i did a lot of research trying to find airplanes that look like what i saw.

a few days later, a family friend who is a self-declared sceptic saw the same object flying in a similar motion. the only difference was that it shot off faster than anything he had ever seen. needless to say, he now believes there is something out there worth investigating.
content.summary: Saw a boomerang object with 3 lights flying very strangely.

content.detailedDescription: After winning/losing ?- our high school football game, myself and 3 other guys hopped into a convertible car and started driving around town and the countryside. someone shouted look there and pointed up. there were 6 bright green globes floating around, with no sound, flying in formation. first one then two then three in the formation. they flew around in all kinds of directions, and making corners faster and closer than a jet of the day could possibly have done. during the whole show, they did not once break formation, then after about 20 minutes, they were gone, but after so many years, i do not remember how they left the scene. i had heard about flying saucers of course, and i am a true sci-fi buff, but it was really amazing and very exciting to see something like that! about 20 minutes after they left, there was a huge flash of light behind black butte just to the north east of town. a flash of light that disappeared immediately.
content.summary: Six green globes flying in formation around sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Our 11 year old daughter and her friend were on the playground at round top elementary near blythewood, sc outside of columbia on monday january 28th, 2008 when they saw a cigar shaped metallic craft hovering over the tree line.  she said it was approximately the size of a two story house and made no noise and had no doors or windows.  her friend immediately said oh my god it's a ufo.  they continued to stare at it for about 1 or 2 minutes and then it just disappeared.  she said they were both very scared and afraid to say anything to the teacher or the other kids.  they were shocked by what they saw.  when my wife picked her up at school later that day, she was very excited and told my wife what she had seen.  now she doesn't want to talk about it.  

on february 2nd, 2008 while our daughter was staying at a friends house, at approximately 2:30 am our 16 year old son came running into our bedroom waking us up saying he had just seen a cigar shaped craft hovering over our house outside of his window.  he said it had blue and red lights and a kind of beam of light shining out to the front.  it had no doors or windows and no flames or exhaust coming out that would allow it to hover like that.  he said it appeared to be about 30 or so feet in length and was up over the house towards the front, but it was hard to tell how far up it was because there was nothing to judge the distance by.  but it did appear to be close.  he ran to get a camera in our family room and when he returned it was gone.  he then came and woke us up.  he was very scared.
content.summary: Our daughter and her friend saw a cigar shaped object hovering over the trees at school while on the playground.

content.detailedDescription:
First, i was between 7-9 years old. my father took me on a 'cat fishing' weekend on the platte river - or one of the many run-offs from the platte. it was 1969-1971 summer. my best guess as is my father was that it happened in july-aug of 1970 after nightfall - probably in the early hours. (ie, between 11pm - 2am) it was pitch-black, no clouds, no city lights, and only stars! i remember that very well... we were probably an hour away from the any large city (lincoln, omaha).

i became tired of fishing - dad, myself, and a friend of his were fishing from dad's friend's "john" boat - in the middle of the platte, just floating along slowly with the current. i laid down in the john boat and gazed at the sky. i was laying there for no more than a few minutes when i noticed a silver-grey tube in the sky. kind of cigar shaped. it was traveling east-west or vice versa (but was following the platte river). as i focused on it, i immediately noticed that there was a saucer/disk/circle (of different color) on one side of it, like it was escourting it. on the other side and slightly behind it was another disk/saucer/circle that was bright orange. it stayed slightly behind it but seemed to be a rear escourt (i'm using analogy for ease).
as the object passed overhead, there was no noise, no wind, no anything...
i thought it was bugs/birds/planes (the ne air national guard was using rf-4 phantoms at that time and they used to buzz the platte reg. - a very cool offering for kids at that time!)
as i said, i dismissed it as an illusion, bugs, planes, etc...Until i saw it again! it had passed over once and then, as if in orbit or trajectory, passed over us again in the same configuration. that was several minutes later!
this time i notified my dad and his friend who both saw it. my dad immediately pulled me to him and i could tell he was a little concerned.
i did not feel worried or any fear. actually, i wanted them to land so i could see them.
my dad's friend tried to tell us that it was either an old gemini capsule reentering the atmosphere or maybe a spent stage 1 from one of the apollo shots. i remember thinking/knowing that was crap since they would have made a sound or crashed! (they were far to big/close not to)
i cannot nor would i suggest any size of what i saw or how fast they were traveling. but, i would guess that what i saw was at least 200 feet from the ground (probably further then that!) but i'm just guessing because the tallest trees we have around that area can be upwards of 150 feet. and i saw the ufo(s) pass to the horizon.
-the best analogy i can give for what i saw that evening/morning was a silver hotdog (very shiny) with a colored disk on one side almost touching it (about midway down the hotdog) and a bright orange disk on the other side but near the 'rear' end of the hotdog and just a little bit further back. in other words the orange one wasn't as close as the first disk. i do not remember the color of the first disk but blue keeps coming to mind (note: it was many years ago and i'm sure that my memory would not be correct so i will not guess i just remember it was not orange or silver!)

so in closing here is the way it unfolded:
-cloudless summer night.
-i was laying in a boat watching the stars.
-i saw a silver cylinder with two different colored disks pass over head.
-some time later i noticed that it passed over again. (same direction same orientation/configuration)
-i notified my dad who seemed concerned.
-friend thought it was an old gemini/apollo/ or military aircraft.
-never saw it again.
-years later, i ran into a person who described a similar event around the same area! (of which i dismissed his story because he already knew about mine)
content.summary: Cigar shape w/ 2 disks accompanying

content.detailedDescription:
memorandum ufo sighting
				                           july 17, 2007

on my return trip from castle rock and florence colorado, late night of july 17, 2007 about 11:50 p.M., i had an encounter with a ufo that followed me for about 5 miles on route 160 not far south of cortez, colorado located in the southwest corner of the state of colorado. 

while traveling south on route 160, shortly after leaving cortez, colorado, i observed to my right, (west) next to the roadway a distance of what appeared to be, from my perspective, about a hundred yards, two horizontal parallel rows of lights perhaps 25 feet apart one above the other, moving like strobe lights from right to left (what would be clockwise if coming from a sphere rotating in a spherical manner).  these lights followed at the same pace of my vehicle for about a mile and when the roadway turned somewhat sharply to the left the lights passed in front of me still off the road but as i came out of he turn the lights were now on my left (east) side of the road about the same 100 yards or less off the road.  at first i didn't know what it was i thought is it a train.  i couldn't conceive what it was.  i began to think it was a ufo, i slowed down, opened my window to listen but heard nothing, of course, my engine was running so that diminished the sound if there was any.  i drove like that for about a mile or more and the lights stayed with me.  then i started to leave the lights behind as it apparently stopped and i kept driving.  the lights stayed where they had stopped but kept rotating making them appear like strobe lights.  

finally, i found a dirt road to pull off to my right (west side of the road) i got out and took three digital photos of what i saw, but they only came out as a faint light in the photo - i was about a 1/3rd of a mile from it when i decided to take the pix, and all i really saw the entire time i watched it were the lights moving similar to strobe light movement.  it occurred to me that the lights i was seeing were actually the result of the spinning of the object.  it was quite large but i could only see the lights because it was a moonless night and it was pitch black in the desolate area of sw colorado.  i eliminated any possible earthly object or phenomenon, ergo, it was a ufo.  i should have investigated further but didn't - i'm an idiot!  it was right there, within reach, not out in the sky.  i'm attaching 3 photos that i took.   all it shows is a light left of the mile marker that is prominent in the pix.  the reflective nature of the mile marker responded to the flash.  i was hoping that even though i could not see the object except for the lights, that maybe some photo expert could determine the object that the lights were coming from.  the distance was about 1/3 mile away from where i photoed it.  it was late and i had a long drive back to palm springs, so i just drove away with the lights still visible in the same place where it stopped.
content.summary: lights from a ufo followed my vehicle at ground level off the roadway about 100 yards or less for several miles.

content.detailedDescription: I lived in a hotel that was being remodeled on the beach in pampano, fl. i was only 7 years old at the time and was living with my mother and brother. our hotel room had a small balconly that faced the pacific ocean. i remember waking up late at night and walking outside onto the balconey where my brother was already siting in a beach chair facing the ocean, there was no noise and no wind, when i looked down to see the beach there where strang human shaped figures glowing red walking along the beach. the red glow looked like when you take a flashlight and put it against your hand the othere side of your hand glows red. i then noticed a large odd shaped gray/black cube ufo with yellow lights moving very slow between two large hotels that were to the right of our hotel. my brother was awake but dazed. i don't remember anything else about the night but what i did remember of the night stuck with me. a few years later when i was 9 or 10 my brother and i were on a trip with our father it was really late at night and i can't remember what started the conversation but my brother was telling me about what he thought was a very vivid dream. he saw the same thing that i saw but from his prospective in the beach chair on the balconey. he does not remember me standing to his left on the balconey but he does remember the human shaped figures on the beach and the odd cubed shaped ufo slowly moving between the hotels. it really scared me that i was not the only one with the exact memory. i have not seen anything like it since and i am now 23 years old. i believe we both witnessed a ufo and some form of alien life forms. my brother was 11 or 12 years old at the time. i have always wonderd if anyone else has reported a simalure sighting around the same dates and place as we did. i now it was 1991 but i am not sure of the month. i remember the year because hurican andrew hit in feb/1992 and we had to move.
content.summary: Large cube with small cubes attached

content.detailedDescription:
I had been sitting in the window smoking a ciggarette as 8 o'clock was about to roll around. and unexpectedly i started to some light above me from my window. it had shocked me so much that i stayed silent for a moment, and i said to girlfriend and my friend who had been there at the time, "hey.. i'm pretty sure this is a ufo, come here and look at this." and we all started getting excited, because who'd ever expect to just see a huge triangular ufo probably each side length being a quarter mile or more. so my friend and i ran to put on our shoes and tried to get out to follow and see it for longer. but we didnt make it more than 30 yards before it had shot off to space to the size of a star and later was gone
 on the back it had white lights in a barred pattern as if they were side by side office windows or something but you couldnt see in them because they were just too bright, but on the bottom of the craft it was strangely arranged red and blue lights, that covered practicly the entire bottom surface, an odd pattern where there were blue lights acrossed the entire sides of the bottom surface and on the center it was all red lights and some yellow/white.

i've included a drawn picture thats as close as i can remember, which is pretty close i'd assume. i remember it well.
content.summary: Sitting in my window smoking a ciggarette and i looked up and a ufo was coming over my house

content.detailedDescription:
From my kitchen sliding glass window i noticed a very intense light pulsing low over the horizon. it pulsed 4 times and was whitish in color.

i ran to the bedroom to show my girlfriend. she came to the bedroom sliding glass window. there was no sign for a few moments, maybe 20 seconds. the pulsing began again. it pulsed 4 times then went dark, i will refer to the dark period as a pause.
it pulsed again 3 times then a pause. it pulsed 2 times then a pause. then it pulsed 12 times changing to a bluish lavender color. at this point the pulsing stopped. 

i have never seen anything such as this in my life.
i have lived here in the antelope valley near plant 42 for many years and have never seen such a display. i know my aircraft being the child of an af b-52 pilot and i was scared so was my girlfriend...
content.summary: Random but consistant very intense flashing lights

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
i was hungry and decided to head to the nearest town for some fast food. i was driving in my car down route 91 heading from putney vermont to brattleboro, the nearest city. i go to college nearby. as i drove i noticed a set of blinking lights at 10 o'clock high in my windshield. at first i assumed they were running lights from a helicopter or a prop driven plane. 
     the object remained in my field of view for about a minute and a half when i took notice of it's oddly behaving running lights, they were blinking very rapidly, far faster than any running lights i have ever seen. they were also more numerous, at least eight. my father flew helicopters for the army and i was intent upon getting a pilots license for many years. i am somewhat familiar with running lights.The object moved in a slow circle, never altering its angle or appearance. the lights kept flashing in random colors, reds, greens, blues, and inbetween colors such as orange, purple, yellow, and it simply hung around in the night sky. 
     i thought that it may have been something in my car that was flashing, so i waved my hand over the dashboard while i drove. then i shut off my instrument panel, and even briefly killed my headlights, there was enough moonlight for me to navigate briefly without them on. which was a stupid and illegal thing to do, but i wanted to make sure that i saw what i saw.
     the object, whatever it was disappeared behind the tree line as i took a curve. i thought i had lost it, but it reappeared approximately 15 seconds later, circling back overhead. 
     i reached brattleboro exit #3 off of route 91 at between two or three minutes of spotting the object, the object never got any closer to my vehicle, either by descending or ascending. nor did it appear to get any closer to my vehilce than when i first noticed it. i pulled off of the exit and ran over the entire event again in my head. 

     as for feelings and emotions, i was confused when i noticed the lights, they didn't seem to match anything i had ever seen. i was curious, but the object never acted in a manner that would make me feel threatened or nervous. i wasn't in awe because at the time i was just a little unsure of what i was seeing. after 4 days, i figured it would be at least appropriate to send in a report.
content.summary: An series of blinking lights, rapidly, less than a second in between

content.detailedDescription:
2 fridays in a row,in 1974, my boyfriend,girlfriend and her boyfriend were crusing down our dirt roads in armada, mi. when,in a corn field we see a disc, dome type thing hovering over a corn field with lights surrounding the bottom of the circular shape thing. we were about 1/4mi from the corn field. the next friday, we decidied to go back to see if we were seeing things. this time, we got out of the car and stood at the edge of the corn field. this is hard write but irealyy don't remember seeing orfeeling my friends around me, but i knew they were there, because i could hear my girlfriend wimpering!!!!! we hung out together for at least an hour, and all of a sudden, this big dome shaped thing slowly came down from the sky.It seemed to be about 6ft. from the corn,and the lights went from fast to slow to faster to really slow and scared the crap out of us, but we couldn't move.  i had no perifial vision or the ability to move. then the next thing i remember is my boyfriend grabbing my hand and running and so was my friends. we got in the car and took off like bats out of hell!! i remember nothing for at least 2 days after that. i don't know how any of us got home or what we did the next day.
to describe what i saw......It was about the size of a baseball diamond. and about 25-30 ft. tall. the lights seemed to be only 5 or 6 ft from the bottom of the thing.  the lights reminded me of xmas lights but very large about a foot in circumference but no real shape. and white!!
and to top it off.....My girlfriends, boyfriends brother and his buddies saw the samw thing at a different time, same location. nobody believed any of us!!!! we know what we saw, we even tried to take my friends parents and they laughed.
the only reason why i'm telling my story now, is because i just 3 yrs ago started to remember eveything, and my boyfriend back then, is now talking about it in detail. which he never did for 30 some yrs. the more i talk about it, the more i remember.
content.summary: Corn field in armada, mi

content.detailedDescription: I got up early to get a drink of water and looked out the kitchen window.  about 3/4 of a mile east of me, over a nearby subdivision, i saw what i thought at first was a plane going to the nearby aurora airport heading west.  it had slow blinking lights.  it seemed large and flying very low.  it then stopped and hovered for about 10 minutes, i am not sure exactly, it was a long time. i took a picture and then went back to bed.  it was still there when i looked out my bathroom window.  it just kept on hovering over these homes.  unfortunately, my camera could not get a clearer view (of course).  i am writing in hopes someone else saw it, as it was there for so long.
content.summary: 3 slowly blinking  lights

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture of the uvs hospital chopper takeing off . i did not see the disk over layed by the sun untill i downloaded the picture to my computer . i have no idea what this is . i would like to know what this is and if it will help .
content.summary: Just a photo taken of the hospital chopper takeing off with a sundog and disk infront of sun

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to get my mail and i was walking towards my mailbox and i turned around and looked up because sometime touched me on the back of my head kind of guilding me to look straight up. i saw a silver oval metalic, with a very shinny surface. i actually stared at it for 2 minutes and then it shot straight up into space.
   when i first noticed it i though it was an airplane and i though to myself it doesn't have wings, it dosen't have propellers and it didn't make any sound at all. so i realized i was looking at a ufo. it was hovering right over me. it was about as high as the airplanes fly in this area. it wasn't anything i had ever seen before...It was definitely not a plane, a baloon or a helicopter.  

i felt like i was drawn to it...It was kind of like a magnetic feeling of energy. i was relaxed and found it very interesting..
content.summary: I went outside to get my mail and i was walking towards my mailbox and i turned around and looked up.

content.detailedDescription: I noted this while finally getting around to a detailed revue of photos taken in 2003 while in montana de oro state park near los osos, ca.  i took a series of photos while there, and one frame in particular stood out.  while shooting photos of the beach & surf, i captured an object about 1,000 feet up along with 3 black lines which look sort of like sheet music or high voltage lines.  there are no such lines in the park (besides these are too high in the sky to be power lines). looks to me as if the object might be somehow projecting the lines, however in subsequent frames the object disappears but the lines are still there for about 3 frames. i took another set of photos in the same area about 3 minutes later with no lines, however i did capture what my son has told me is an f111 stealth fighter.  vanderburg afb isn't too far away, so maybe it's one of their's.  the f111 was flying much lower than the object and it was strange to see it.  it appeared at 11:08 am, about 21 minutes later.
content.summary: Saucer shaped object along with 3 distinct black lines in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
On or about this date--my husband and i have been wondering if anyone else seen this......It was in indian river cnty,sebastian.Fla. it came up as we were sitting at the end of our dock looking toward the barrier isands-toward the ocean.

   the egg shaped rather large ship with amber lights appeared about midnite,looking north about where the sebastian inlet--my husband said look-look at that  time it was straight infront of me/he it started to rise and disappeard  rising to the clouds ............It all lasted about 7 secs''''''''''''''''we were just wondering if anyone else seen it!!          someone had to, theres an airport near  by.


if anyone else seen something to this effect plz let us know.

we are beleivers!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Within secs it came out of the water
